title: Fantasy RPG Icons - Things
description: This is a large bundle of images generated in a specific and consistent style, focused on objects and things in the fantasy / RPG style.
longDescription:
Support, Questions, News & Updates

➡️ Discord | YouTube | InfinityPBR.com

--------------------------------------------------


This package contains over 80 images, focused on objects and other "things" in the fantasy / RPG style.


The style of this package ranges from more realistic-painterly, to photorealistic. They will appear more photoreal, and generally "better", when at smaller resolutions. Use these for placeholder art while you prototype, for icons and buttons, for backgrounds, and more.


Aspect Ratio: Most images are 1:1 (square) or 16:10.

Resolution: Most images are 4096 x 4096, or similar depending on the aspect ratio.
technicalDetails:
Texture Resolutions: (complete list)

  • 2048 x 2048 x1
  •  4608 x 3072 x 41
  • 4096 x 4096 x 42


The images are delivered in a higher resolution than they will likely be used. Please decrease the resolution within Unreal to obtain the optimal size for your project.


Please note: This mid-journey AI-generated package has been carefully curated by a human (me!), and is intended to provide users with a large library of ready-to-use images in a specific, consistent style and theme. All images are post-processed, and many are run through Photoshop to improve them further.


In general, many images look better when displayed at half size, or high DPI. There may still be some artefacts in the images. This style aims to be more realistic, and many images are very close to photo-realistic. At full resolution, the photorealism is diminished, and some images have a more painterly look to them.
